1.name: The Princess Bride
1.description: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

2.name: Full Metal Jacket
2.description: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

3.name: Some Kind of Wonderful
3.description: When Keith goes out with Amanda, the girl of his dreams, Amanda's ex-boyfriend plans to get back at Keith. Meanwhile, Keith's best friend, tomboy Watts, realizes she has feelings for Keith.

4.name: Dirty Dancing
4.description: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

5.name: The Lost Boys
5.description: After moving to a new town, two brothers discover that the area is a haven for vampires.

6.name: Summer School
6.description: Freddy the gym teacher has to teach remedial English in summer (high) school, if he wants tenure. As he can only teach gym and his students want fun, emphasis is on "field trips" - until he's fired unless all his students pass the test.

7.name: Masters of the Universe
7.description: The heroic warrior He-Man battles against the evil lord Skeletor and his armies of darkness for control of Castle Grayskull.

8.name: RoboCop
8.description: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

9.name: Lethal Weapon
9.description: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.

10.name: Spaceballs
10.description: A rogue star pilot and his trusty sidekick must come to the rescue of a Princess and save the galaxy from a ruthless race of beings known as Spaceballs.

11.name: The Untouchables
11.description: During the era of Prohibition in the United States, Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone, and because of rampant corruption, assembles a small, hand-picked team to help him.

12.name: Predator
12.description: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

13.name: Fatal Attraction
13.description: A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

14.name: Hellraiser
14.description: An unfaithful wife encounters the zombie of her dead lover; the demonic cenobites are pursuing him after he escaped their sadomasochistic underworld.

15.name: Jaws: The Revenge
15.description: Chief Brody's widow believes that her family is deliberately being targeted by another shark in search of revenge.

16.name: Empire of the Sun
16.description: A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation during World War II.

17.name: Adventures in Babysitting
17.description: A babysitter must battle her way through the big city after being stranded there with the kids she's looking after.

18.name: Overboard
18.description: A cruel but beautiful heiress mocks and cheats a hired carpenter. When she gets amnesia after an accident, he decides to introduce her to regular life by convincing her they're husband and wife.

19.name: The Running Man
19.description: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.

20.name: The Gate
20.description: Kids, left home alone, accidentally unleash a horde of malevolent demons from a mysterious hole in their suburban backyard.

21.name: Raising Arizona
21.description: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

22.name: Can't Buy Me Love
22.description: A nerdy outcast secretly pays the most popular girl in school one thousand dollars to be his girlfriend.

23.name: The Monster Squad
23.description: A young group of monster fanatics attempt to save their hometown from Count Dracula and his monsters.

24.name: Moonstruck
24.description: Loretta Castorini, a bookkeeper from Brooklyn, New York, finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she has agreed to marry.

25.name: Angel Heart
25.description: A private investigator is hired by a man who calls himself Louis Cyphre to track down a singer named Johnny Favorite. But the investigation takes an unexpected and somber turn.

26.name: Planes, Trains & Automobiles
26.description: A man must struggle to travel home for Thanksgiving with an obnoxious slob of a shower curtain ring salesman as his only companion.

27.name: Beverly Hills Cop II
27.description: Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to help Taggart and Rosewood investigate Chief Bogomil's near-fatal shooting and the series of "alphabet crimes" associated with it.

28.name: Evil Dead II
28.description: The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

29.name: Prince of Darkness
29.description: A research team finds a mysterious cylinder in a deserted church. If opened, it could mean the end of the world.

30.name: Wall Street
30.description: A young and impatient stockbroker is willing to do anything to get to the top, including trading on illegal inside information taken through a ruthless and greedy corporate raider who takes the youth under his wing.

31.name: Over the Top
31.description: Tough trucker Lincoln Hawk is determined to win back his son and triumph at the world arm wrestling championships.

32.name: The Living Daylights
32.description: James Bond is living on the edge to stop an evil arms dealer from starting another world war. Bond crosses all seven continents in order to stop the evil Whitaker and General Koskov.

33.name: Less Than Zero
33.description: A college freshman returns to L.A. for the holidays at his ex-girlfriend's request, but discovers that his former best friend has an out-of-control drug habit.

34.name: Mannequin
34.description: A young artist, searching for his vocation, makes a mannequin so perfect he falls in love with it. Finding the mannequin in a store window, he gets a job there and his creation comes to life.

35.name: Der Himmel über Berlin
35.description: An angel tires of overseeing human activity and wishes to become human when he falls in love with a mortal.

36.name: *batteries not included
36.description: Apartment block tenants seek the aid of alien mechanical life-forms to save their building from demolition.

37.name: Harry and the Hendersons
37.description: The Henderson family adopt a friendly Sasquatch but have a hard time trying to keep the legend of 'Bigfoot' a secret.

38.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors
38.description: A psychiatrist familiar with knife-wielding dream demon Freddy Krueger helps teens at a mental hospital battle the killer who is invading their dreams.

39.name: Good Morning, Vietnam
39.description: In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services radio station in Vietnam.

40.name: The Last Emperor
40.description: The story of the final Emperor of China.

41.name: Innerspace
41.description: A hapless store clerk must foil criminals to save the life of the man who, miniaturized in a secret experiment, was accidentally injected into him.

42.name: La Bamba
42.description: Biographical story of the rise from nowhere of early rock and roll singer Ritchie Valens who died at age 17 in a plane crash with Buddy Holly and the Big Bopper.

43.name: The Witches of Eastwick
43.description: Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives.

44.name: Near Dark
44.description: A small-town farmer's son reluctantly joins a traveling group of vampires after he is bitten by a beautiful drifter.

45.name: Dragnet
45.description: The equally-straight-laced and "by the book" nephew of Joe Friday must work with his more laid-back partner to solve a mystery.

46.name: 3 Men and a Baby
46.description: Three bachelors find themselves forced to take care of a baby left by one of the guys' girlfriends.

47.name: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
47.description: The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man.

48.name: Bad Taste
48.description: The population of a small town disappears and is replaced by aliens that chase human flesh for their intergalactic fast-food chain.

49.name: Baby Boom
49.description: The life of super-yuppie J.C. is thrown into turmoil when she inherits a baby from a distant relative.

50.name: Creepshow 2
50.description: Three more bone-chilling tales that include a vengeful wooden Native American, a monstrous blob in a lake, and a hitchhiker who wants revenge and will not die.
